channel.title: Comments on: Things You Learn The Hard Way

item.title: By: brody carson
item.dc:creator: brody carson
item.description: we shouldn't run two virtual machines in paralell. what if we use vmware for this.?
item.content:encoded:
we shouldn’t run two virtual machines in paralell.
what if we use vmware for this.?

item.title: By: Branson Computer Repair
item.dc:creator: Branson Computer Repair
item.description: I had a hard time when we made the transition from cPanel to Plesk on our web server. It was a definite learning experience.
item.content:encoded: I had a hard time when we made the transition from cPanel to Plesk on our web server. It was a definite learning experience.
